DataElement.preferredName: Agent Name Code Type Investigational New Drug Holder Information 150 Character Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text to describe an agent by its name, code, type of action or pharmacologic group, and/or investigational new drug (IND) holder.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Agent Name Code Type Investigational New Drug Holder Information
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect._The words or language units by which a thing is known._A system of numbered categories for representation of data._Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities._A new drug or biological drug that is used in a clinical investigation. The term also includes a biological product that is used in vitro for diagnostic purposes._A person who has physical possession or legal rights to something._Knowledge derived from study, experience, or instruction that has been gathered or received by communication.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect. (NCI)

Concepts.definition: An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect.

Property.preferredName: Name Code Type Investigational New Drug Holder Information
Property.preferredDefinition: The words or language units by which a thing is known.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.:Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.:A new drug or biological drug that is used in a clinical investigation. The term also includes a biological product that is used in vitro for diagnostic purposes.:A person who has physical possession or legal rights to something.:Knowledge derived from study, experience, or instruction that has been gathered or received by communication.

Concepts.definition: The words or language units by which a thing is known.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.
Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.
A new drug or biological drug that is used in a clinical investigation. The term also includes a biological product that is used in vitro for diagnostic purposes.
A person who has physical possession or legal rights to something.
Knowledge derived from study, experience, or instruction that has been gathered or received by communication.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Text; the words of something written.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Text; the words of something written.

DataElement.changeDescription: Curated to support NCI caAERS integration with Rave 6.2014 D.Reeves
